item.title: Poo in communal lift, 30th June
item.description:
Someone has poo'd in the lift. The reporter is blind, this is a safety hazard for vulnerable people. She is scared to leave her home, believes this is unfair for individuals to have to endure. The estate cleaner said he would not clean it.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Woodberry Down Estate, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Uncollected bins for 3 weeks, 30th June
item.description:
This has been raised to the Waste Collection dept by the warden of the sheltered scheme and still the bins have not been collected. The block houses elderly people and the bins not collected is unsanitary and can cause on outbreak of vermin and disease.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bethune Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Tree Over hanging Boundary and too High, 30th June
item.description:
We are the Managing Agents for Northumberland Court Erith Road DA8 3LT. The Tree is overhanging the boundary into Northumberland Court Erith Road DA8 3LT. This is causing the vehicles parked in their car park to get sap and debris on them which damages the vehicles. It is also reducing the light to the properties. We have written to the block of flats we think the tree is in the grounds of several times but have never received a reply. We thank you for your kind attention.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Erith Road, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Untaxed vehicle R26 KLM parked on grass verge, 30th June
item.description:
This untaxed car is parked on a grass verge in Rosecroft close. This car belongs to the tenants in 15 Rosecroft Close, Orpington, Kent, BR5 4DX. Please ask the tenants to remove the car from the grass verge, which has now been ruined by tyre tracks, and from parking the car in the road. They have a driveway. Thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Rosecroft Close, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet
